column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Mrs Parker'''.<ref name="dreweattss">{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.liveauctioneers.com/item/35470442_tolkien-jrr-autograph-letter-signed-to-mrs|articlename=Lot 277 - J.R.R. Tolkien Letter Signed|website=[http://www.liveauctioneers.com/ Live Auctioneers]|accessed=21 March 2015}}</ref>

column1: *'''Contents:''' [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wishes a merry Christmas and a fortunate new year to Mrs Parke.

column2: 6 lines with hand-drawn Christmas holly to one corner and signed "J.R.R.T."
column4: wishing Mrs Parke the best for Christmas and a happier and more fortunate 1969
column6: 8vo . Mrs Parke acted as driver and general helper to the Tolkiens for several hours a week
column7: after responding to an ad in a local Bournemouth newspaper placed by Edith Tolkien.
